value:
Tanya is a meddler. She's always
playing with fire, and I'm the one
who has to put it out.

We fought under Eyvel's command as
the Freeblades and ran all the bad
guys out of Fiana.

Oh, sorry! I'm a big guy, so I'm always
bumping into people. Let me help
you up!

Heroes from across history gather at
this castle? I want to test my strength!
Summon somebody I can fight!

Now THAT was a meal... Time for a
nap! Oh...you want me to help clean
up? You sound like my dad!

You're $Nu?
Hey there.

Nobody, and I mean nobody, can
catch ME! Who's next?

Gettin' warmed up. Let's keep
it going!
Little hard to stay interested.
Thanks! This is going to help a lot.

I'm Osian of the Fiana Freeblades.
No matter the foe, I'll be sure to
smash them with my axe!

There you are! It's been a while since
I arrived, but I still get a little shock
when I see your smiling face.$k$pI followed Leif to the fight in Leonster,
but things are even rougher here,
aren't they?$k$pIt's a good thing I have a talent for
knocking heads. The food's pretty
good, too, so I don't really mind.$k$pI do worry about the people back in
Fiana sometimes...like my dad. What,
this? That's just dust in my eye!$k$pNo matter where I go, I stay the same,
for better or worse... As long as I have
my arm and this axe, it'll all work out.
でやあっ
くたばれ！
ぐっ
くそっ…！
Messed with the wrong guy!
You're done, kid!
Plenty more where that came from!
Aw, don't run!
I...messed up...
Hehe...
I'm Osian. I live with my dad in Fiana.
Hey! Hands off!
My dad's always getting in my face. I wish he'd just lay off.
What's the point of even having a dad if he only exists to nag you?
Eyvel says I rile too easy. I'm not gonna prove her right by yelling at her about it though.
You can't take your eyes off Tanya for a second. She's always getting caught up in something.
I'll hack all our foes to bits. You watch.
Yeah, yeah.
C'mon.
Way ahead of you!
